Ravenette's tablet: This tablet has the Ravenette AI. It seems a bit too sarcastic to be very useful, though.
faux feathers: These came from Nullbird's workbench. You never really understood their 'unique' sense of fashion.
loose wires: You used to make little wire sculptures. You stopped to find more important pursuits. You still haven't found one yet.
electronic rubber chicken: Once just a humorous prop, the rubber chicken has since become a cornerstone of modern technology.
